analyzed: prajñā upāyayoḥ mahā sukha cakra stham oṅkāra hakārāt avatīrṇa aurṇaḥ jñāna ceta
maṇi sūtra vat ekīkṛtya dolayā mahāmudrā upadeśaḥ
āśu siddhi karaḥ proktaḥ nelīpādena dhīmatā
kṛṣṇa ācāryaiḥ samākhyātā caṇḍālī nābhi madhya gā
ādi svara svabhāvā asau dahati anāhatam mukhāt
nirmāṇe tilakā khyātā vasantaḥ dharma cakra gaḥ
dvayoḥ eka svabhāvaḥ tu kṛṣṇa ācāryeṇa khyāpitam
kartavyā yoga yuktena khyāpitam sa raheṇa tu
nirmāṇa cakra ādi ākāra kamala varaṭa kekara hakārau
mṛṇāla tantu ākāreṇa ekībhūya anāhata drāviṇau iti bhūripādāḥ
nirmāṇa cakre ravi soma sampuṭa jñāna bindu samutthitau rekhayā
kāli sampuṭa svarūpayā tribhiḥ veṣṭaya punar utthitau rekhā dvaya prajñā upāya

original: svabhāvau | ekā śuklā dharmacakrāt pratinivṛtya paśyet , dvitīyā
analyzed: svabhāvau ekā śuklā dharmacakrāt pratinivṛtya paśyet dvitīyā
cakram prajñā svabhāvāḥ anāhatam kāntam iva āliṅgayati iti vīṇāpāda matam
nirmāṇa cakra intarīkṣa cakra stham oṅkāram mukhena śītkāra vāyu apraveśena
gaṇayet budhaḥ iti virūpa ācāryeṇa deśitam
mukhena gholayet prājñaḥ yāvat advaya tām vrajet
akāra akṣara hakārau virūpa ācāryeṇa deśitam
nirmāṇa padma stha yoni cakrasya karṇikā jvalati dharmacakra gatā bhavet
saṃbhoga sthāna āhata rekhayā ekībhavati iti nāga buddheḥ

original: mukhena nirgamapraveśavāyunā akārahaṃkārau tāvad gholayed yāvada-
analyzed: mukhena nirgama praveśa vāyunā akāra ahaṃkārau tāvat gholayet yāvat
tatas adhara daśane saṃsthāpya rasanayā ākramet iti

original: mukhe rakta aṃkāro nirgamena ca vāyunā |
analyzed: mukhe rakta aṃkāraḥ nirgamena ca vāyunā
upāya śukra huṃkāra praveśena ca gholayet
nāga saṃkāya mukha akṣi karṇa nāsikāḥ api vā vāyu yantraṇāt adhik api
kaḥ api jvalate vīraḥ matsya indra matam īdṛśam
prajñāśirasi oṅkāram upāyaśirasi hū dvayam adhomukham

original: antarmadhye ca vajrādimukhe prajñāsthitavāyunā hato bindurupāyaśikhāgraṃ yāti |
analyzed: antar madhye ca vajra ādi mukhe prajñā sthita vāyunā hataḥ binduḥ upāya śikhā agram yāti
upāya vāyunā hataḥ binduḥ prajñā śikhā agram yāti
cintitaḥ san jñāna dīpa śikhā ākāraḥ oṅkāra vacaḥ liṅgitaḥ sukha maya tvena
vibhāvitaḥ san dāha anantaram śikhāt sukha maya bhāvanāt

original: cakradvaye lā hū mā ityādyakṣarāṇi jñānabodhicittadrāvakaṇi |
analyzed: cakra dvaye lā hū mā ityādi akṣarāṇi
yat cakrāt vinivṛtya jñāna bindum mukham parivartya pśyati
oṅkāra vajra mukhena vāyum praveśayet sukha svabhāva tvena
aoṅkāram niḥsarantam vāyu ākṛṣṭam hukāram praviś vāyu ārūḍham

original: prajñapadmanasāgre gholarandhrāgre ca vāsati śabdaṃ karoti sukharūpaṃ bindum |
analyzed: prajña padma nasā agre ghola randhra agre ca śabdam karoti sukha rūpam bindum

original: mukhādikaṃ prathamādeva bhāvanayā hastadvayāṅgulyā pīḍayet, bhāvanā-
analyzed: mukha ādikam prathamāt eva bhāvanayā hasta dvaya aṅgulyā pīḍayet bhāvanā
